TopicTitle: Game crashes when I recover craft, or go to space center.

Articles.Content:
Running Modded 32bit KSP on steam

Recently KSP has been crashing when I am recovering a craft, or returning to VAB, or returning to space center. Basically when I change scenes, it has a chance of crashing. Usually after 4-6 scene changes. I think its not memory related because it only happens when I change scenes and the error log shows that I still have memory left when I crash.

Im running a "semi-light" mod install (haha) but here is the list.

B9 Procedural Wings

EVE 0.24 7-4

Collision FX

FAR

RasterPropMonitor

KAX

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

KW Rocketry

PlanetShine for 1.0.2

scatterer WIP

Texture Replacer

And here is the link to the error log and output log.

Error Log:

http://www34.zippyshare.com/v/5kuxNm0K/file.html

Output Log:

http://www34.zippyshare.com/v/ZA9i2Wbu/file.html

Any help is appreciated.

Edited August 4, 2015 by PolarizedBear

0 MB physical memory [2524 MB free].

0 MB paging file [3332 MB free].

0 MB user address space [168 MB free].

This will get used up in one scene change.. very quickly !!

Edited August 6, 2015 by ColKlonk
